OOC: Yeah... I decided to speed things along a bit with the 
sentencing so I brought in the hologram sim thing blacky would have 
had to fight if she chose the bamphomet choice. So shes now going to 
have to fight a simulated version of the guy undersized.

Blight burst out in laughter as Shivas threat was recieved. He held 
his stomach as he pounded his fist on the console in front of him and 
then looked back up.

Blight: "oh? You were serious. Well come and get Darkfate and your 
wretched little blacknightmare you fool! You will never get to even 
set foot into this facility! I dare you to come here. It is about 
time I did have some fun on this world and blasting you filthy 
Predacons to bits will suffice quite nicely."

Meanwhile back where Blacknightmare is the shots hit the holo 
hellpeon but do little to it. It then is about to attack her once 
again when it dissapears, leaving blacknightmare alone. However this 
relief will have been short lived as suddenly in its place stood 
another Simulation type being thing. One that was the same hologram 
as before which I revealed OOC as a hologram of the bamphomet.

????: "No matter what happens now... you die... I created this test 
to wipe out the weak, and to fully make sure I only recieved the 
strong, those who made the wrong choice would have to face me. The 
test is over and your fate remains unchanged. This program shall give 
you dose of reality of what your people stand against. Come now and 
die."

And with that the simulation of the being who is known to this RPG 
since the real one spoke once but was in another form... Suddenly 
dashes off to the side of Blacknightmare at speeds unparalleled to 
anything she had scene so far. And just as quick a lance double 
bladed lance type thing appeared in its hand. The being then leaped 
high into the air and then flew straight down at an angle slashing at 
Blacknightmare with each side as it then outstretched its hand to 
send a massive ray of pure chaochitan energy at Blacknightmare, the 
beam was as big as herself.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Shivah:
> 
> Shivah opened his comm link to all BlackFortress' members and  
> said "Come back to BlackFortress... I have an important anoucement 
to 
> you"
